attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get my daily dose of racism but I was disappointed that the app included various other forms of prejudice and ignorance. Like, I didn’t come here for the homophobic and xenophobic discrimination. I just wanted some good old-fashioned systematic racism and a place to store Trump’s racially insensitive tweets. Ugg, cannot believe the nerve the creators of this app had to let people download such diverse hatred. Do not recommend!
